name: Onslaught (Carl Moss)
overview: 1994 saw the release of shoot 'em up game called Onslaught on the Amiga systems, created and published by Carl Moss for free as a Public Domain. The title Onslaught is chosen well. It's a constant onslaught of enemy formations you have to dodge and destroy. You get no single moment in which you can relax. After 10 and 20 levels, a huge boss enemy appears, filling the screen with even more bullets. A short, fast, exciting, and hard-as-nails space shooter.
